enb_long_title: Twenty-eighth Sessions of the UNFCCC Subsidiary Bodies, Second Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Convention, and fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: Canada proposed considering modalities for parties to graduate from the CDM to joint implementation (JI).
The list also contained several ideas, inter alia , to expand JI s scope, improve its efficiency and consider alternative ways to assess additionality.
